content.title: Made for modern product teams
content.content: Linear is shaped by the practices and principles that distinguish world-class product teams from the rest: relentless focus, fast execution, and a commitment to the quality of craft. Make the switch

cards.title: Make the switch
cards.description: Linear is shaped by the practices and principles that distinguish world-class product teams from the rest: relentless focus, fast execution, and a commitment to the quality of craft. Make the switch

content.title: AI-assisted product development
content.subtitle: Linear MCP
content.content: Linear for Agents. Choose from a variety of AI agents and start delegating work, from code generation to other technical tasks. Streamline your product development workflows with AI assistance for routine, manual tasks. This person was the assignee on previous issues related to performance problems in the mobile app launch flow

sections.title: AI-assisted product development
sections.subtitle: Self-driving product operations

content.title: Set the product direction
content.subtitle: Project Overview
content.content: Align your team around a unified product timeline. Plan, manage, and track all product initiatives with Linear’s visual planning tools. Consolidate specs, milestones, tasks, and other documentation in one centralized location. Communicate progress and project health with built-in project updates.

sections.subtitle: Manage projects end-to-end
sections.multi_column_text: Align your team around a unified product timeline. Plan, manage, and track all product initiatives with Linear’s visual planning tools. | Consolidate specs, milestones, tasks, and other documentation in one centralized location. | Communicate progress and project health with built-in project updates.

content.title: Issue tracking you’ll enjoy using
content.subtitle: Manage incoming work with Triage
content.content: Optimized for speed and efficiency. Create tasks in seconds, discuss issues in context, and breeze through your work in views tailored to you and your team. Create healthy routines and focus your team on what work should happen next. Review and assign incoming bug reports, feature requests, and other unplanned work.
